gw.api.admin

Class DecentralizedAdminFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.DecentralizedAdminFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.BeanBasedQueryFilter, com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter, IBeanFilter, IFilter, IQueryFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecentralizedAdminActivityPatternFilter, DecentralizedAdminRoleFilter

    public abstract class DecentralizedAdminFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter
    Filter for decentralized admin for a generic entity. If decentralized admin is enabled, the entity can be viewed by the decentralized admin if he created it, or if the super user created it.
    Author:
    ahuynh

      • canViewEntity

        public static boolean canViewEntity(User user,
                                    Editable bean)
        A user can view a bean if the bean is part of the super org or if the bean's org is the same as the user's org. Also returns true if decentralized admin is disabled.
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        bean - the bean
        Returns:
        true if the user can view the bean, false otherwise.
